price: Und sie hauten aus den Bergen Häuser aus, im Trachten nach Sicherheit.
arabic: وَكَانُواْ يَنۡحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: wakānū yanḥitūna mina al-jibāli buyūtan āminīna
